Texts.Chs: 使用盾牌时，其基础攻击力增加至150%：且随力量和智力增长。
Texts.Eng:
150% Base Power with Shields:
Scales with Str. and Int.

Texts.Chs: 被动：连续的完美格挡增加伤害和光束长度。普通格挡（不在攻击时）会降低此加成，而格挡失败会重置加成。
Texts.Eng: Passive: Successive Perfect Shields increase Damage and Beam Length. Normal Shield Hits (not while firing) lower this bonus, and Shield Breaks reset it.

Texts.Chs: 完美格挡后恢复10%最大护盾耐久，并给予20%物理、暗影、恶魔和毒素抗性加成，持续5秒。
Texts.Eng: Perfect Shields restore 10% of Max Shield Stamina and grant 5 seconds of +20% Physical, Shadow, Demonic, and Poison Resistance.

Texts.Chs: 按[W]键可以切换无暇之盾，一种将护盾耐久减半的buff，以降低25%的移动速度的代价，赋予你的护盾加成。当你处于活动状态时，攻击你护盾的怪物会受到审判属性的回击，完美格挡会在3秒内使你的最大生命值增加110%，附近的盟友会增加7%的最大生命。该技能的增幅比例在力量和智力上高达12%。
Texts.Eng: Pressing [W] toggles Immaculate Shield, a buff that halves Shield Stamina, lowers Movement Speed by 25%, but grants bonuses for your shield. While active, monsters that hit your shield are stricken with Judgement Status, and Perfect Shields provide a 110% increase to your Max Health for 3 seconds and 7% of your Max Health as instant Health gain to nearby allies. This scales up to 12%+ with Strength and Intelligence.

Texts.Chs: 主要攻击：发射一道造成审判的光束，审判状态会增加重力并降低神圣抵抗。最长保持时间：2秒。
Texts.Eng: Primary Fire: Hold to fire a beam that causes Judgement, a status that increases Gravity and lowers Holy Resistance. Max hold time: 2 seconds.
Secondary Fire: Defend against incoming attacks.
